name: Sea Hag
description: A Sea Hag is a grotesque fey creature with matted hair and slimy skin, known for its horrifying appearance that can paralyze those who look upon her.
memorable: Sea Hags enjoy spreading misery and despair through cunning and malevolent magic, often luring sailors to their demise.
goals: To spread despair, curse trespassers, and terrorize coastal communities.
relations: Often found in covens with other hags, serving as antagonists to adventurers in aquatic realms.
environment: Dwells in the depths of the ocean or along desolate, rocky shores.
strengths: Skilled in illusion and enchantment magic, strong in physical attacks with high Strength and Constitution.
weaknesses: Moderate challenge rating and average Dexterity makes it vulnerable to coordinated attacks.
attacks: Strikes with claws that deal slashing damage and uses a deadly gaze attack to frighten or incapacitate foes.
most_powerful_ability: Death Glare can reduce frightened targets to 0 hit points, creating a significant threat in battle.
senses: Darkvision allows it to see in low-light conditions, enhancing its predatory abilities.
skills: Proficient in Deception and Insight, enhancing its capabilities for manipulation and understanding others.
additional_information: Possesses the ability to disguise itself using Illusory Appearance.
Can breathe both air and water due to its Amphibious trait.
Has an ability called Horrific Appearance that instills fear in nearby creatures.
Can cast spells innately, such as Control Weather and Geas.
Resistant to being charmed or incapacitated.
spellcasting: Innate Spellcasting allows it to cast spells like Dancing Lights and Disguise Self at will.
test_queries: grotesque ocean creature with horrifying gaze
fey hag that spreads misery in coastal areas
amphibious monster skilled in illusion magic
creature that frightens with its horrific appearance
